items.question: What types of images can be processed?
items.answer: You can upload JPG, PNG, and WebP images. The tool works best with clear, well-lit images that have distinct subjects.

items.question: Is it easy to use for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely! The platform is designed for ease of use, allowing anyone, regardless of tech skills, to remove backgrounds effortlessly.

items.question: How long does it take to process an image?
items.answer: Processing is typically instant, with results available within seconds.

items.question: Can I edit the output after background removal?
items.answer: Yes! You can make adjustments as needed before downloading your final image.

items.question: Are there any size limits for the images?
items.answer: Currently, we support images up to 10MB. Larger files may require compression before uploading.

items.question: Is there a subscription fee?
items.answer: No, we offer a pay-as-you-go model, meaning you only pay for what you use without any subscription obligations.

items.question: What is the quality of the output images?
items.answer: All processed images are high-resolution, ensuring crisp clarity for any application.

items.question: Can I use the edited images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, all images edited with our tool can be used for commercial projects without any additional licensing fees.

items.question: What if I encounter an issue with the service?
items.answer: Our support team is available via email and live chat to assist you with any questions or technical difficulties.
